glossdef.p: The fraction of the dose (of thermal effects) that would render a person of average susceptibility incapable of escape.

callout.p: The definition for FED has been modified from the ISO definition to be made specific for the Fire Safety Verification Method. The use of CO or CO2 as part of FED is not part of that Verification Method. This is because the ability to measure CO in a repeatable test varies by two orders of magnitude for common cellosic fuel.
